text: For the pages api (<http://api.hubapi.com/content/api/v2/pages>) is it possible to return the template name in the response? I have a situation where I need to roll through pages built and find what template each page is using. I imagine I can use other apis and match it all up, but it would be easier if this was returned
The issue would be if the template name changes then you would have to update every page object
<@U6GNQ7JBU> is there a way I can merry up the pages and their templates from whats sent back in the api
for example, templates send back a template ID but the pages listing doesnt seem to refernce this anywhere
that will output `generated_path/templateID.html` (or something like that)
Gents, i have a question about transacional email addon. Is there a send limit, or, so to speak, API limit?
